room_title: Escape room "DeRailed" by MindBreak in St. Louis
room_description: You and some colleagues’ are hired to take over a prestigious Billion Dollar Company in the Mountains of Colorado. The executives that hired you, seem pretty cutthroat, and will do anything to secure their business plan. Only two old steam trains have rails to make the hour-long winding trip to the Mountain Top company. You are told to pack your bags and meet at the MindBreak train station. Upon arriving, you learn there is another company there with the same intentions. The Owner of BDC has narrowed the sale to the two companies – and a Lot is at stake. First one up the mountain with the papers and the Check win. And the executives that hired you… have no intentions of losing this DEAL of a LIFETIME!!
